comment:
* Columns in the StreamItems table.
     *
     * @see ContactsContract.StreamItems
     * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future,
     * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.
     *
     * @removed

variables.name: CONTACT_ID
variables.comment:
* A reference to the {@link android.provider.ContactsContract.Contacts#_ID} * that this stream item belongs to. * *

Type: INTEGER

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: CONTACT_LOOKUP_KEY
variables.comment:
* A reference to the {@link android.provider.ContactsContract.Contacts#LOOKUP_KEY} * that this stream item belongs to. * *

Type: TEXT

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: RAW_CONTACT_ID
variables.comment:
* A reference to the {@link RawContacts#_ID} * that this stream item belongs to. *

Type: INTEGER

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: RES_PACKAGE
variables.comment:
* The package name to use when creating {@link Resources} objects for * this stream item. This value is only designed for use when building * user interfaces, and should not be used to infer the owner. *

Type: TEXT

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE
variables.comment:
* The account type to which the raw_contact of this item is associated. See * {@link RawContacts#ACCOUNT_TYPE} * *

Type: TEXT

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
variables.comment:
* The account name to which the raw_contact of this item is associated. See * {@link RawContacts#ACCOUNT_NAME} * *

Type: TEXT

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: DATA_SET
variables.comment:
* The data set within the account that the raw_contact of this row belongs to. This allows * multiple sync adapters for the same account type to distinguish between * each others' data. * {@link RawContacts#DATA_SET} * *

Type: TEXT

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: RAW_CONTACT_SOURCE_ID
variables.comment:
* The source_id of the raw_contact that this row belongs to. * {@link RawContacts#SOURCE_ID} * *

Type: TEXT

*

read-only

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: RES_ICON
variables.comment:
* The resource name of the icon for the source of the stream item. * This resource should be scoped by the {@link #RES_PACKAGE}. As this can only reference * drawables, the "@drawable/" prefix must be omitted. *

Type: TEXT

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: RES_LABEL
variables.comment:
* The resource name of the label describing the source of the status update, e.g. "Google * Talk". This resource should be scoped by the {@link #RES_PACKAGE}. As this can only * reference strings, the "@string/" prefix must be omitted. *

Type: TEXT

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: TEXT
variables.comment:
*

* The main textual contents of the item. Typically this is content * that was posted by the source of this stream item, but it can also * be a textual representation of an action (e.g. ”Checked in at Joe's”). * This text is displayed to the user and allows formatting and embedded * resource images via HTML (as parseable via * {@link android.text.Html#fromHtml}). *

*

* Long content may be truncated and/or ellipsized - the exact behavior * is unspecified, but it should not break tags. *

*

Type: TEXT

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: TIMESTAMP
variables.comment:
* The absolute time (milliseconds since epoch) when this stream item was * inserted/updated. *

Type: NUMBER

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: COMMENTS
variables.comment:
*

* Summary information about the stream item, for example to indicate how * many people have reshared it, how many have liked it, how many thumbs * up and/or thumbs down it has, what the original source was, etc. *

*

* This text is displayed to the user and allows simple formatting via * HTML, in the same manner as {@link #TEXT} allows. *

*

* Long content may be truncated and/or ellipsized - the exact behavior * is unspecified, but it should not break tags. *

*

Type: TEXT

* * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: SYNC1
variables.comment:
* Generic column for use by sync adapters.
         *
         * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future,
         * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: SYNC2
variables.comment:
* Generic column for use by sync adapters.
         *
         * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future,
         * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: SYNC3
variables.comment:
* Generic column for use by sync adapters.
         *
         * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future,
         * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.

variables.name: SYNC4
variables.comment:
* Generic column for use by sync adapters.
         *
         * @deprecated - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future,
         * cursors returned from related queries will be empty.
